text:
We are looking for a Postdoc Researcher to help us build a framework to protect programs from hardware attacks! 
 The position is offering the chance to conduct research, supervise PhD students and research engineers, and collaborate with experts in security.
 Having experience in formal verification, microarchitectural security, program analysis, or compiler design is a plus.
 Join us at KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm! Apply here: https://www.kth.se/lediga-jobb/796677?l=en
GitHub Pages makes it easy to host a simple blog!
